CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 7, 1938, pg. 9, reads: "Took The Town By Storm - Gracious, beautiful Marva Louis, guest mannekin in Y.M.C.A. Junior Hostesses Fashion Revue, last Friday night, took the town by storm. She and her popular hubby, Joe, were practically mobbed by hundreds of admirers.  Marva appeared in fetching sports, afternoon, evening and cocktail gowns. - Photo by Teenie Harris."
TitMainTitle: Marva Louis standing behind artificial palm tree, for Centre Avenue YMCA Junior Hostesses Fashion Revue
